revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Compex |model=WP54G |fcc_date=10/28/2005 |is_manuf=No |availability=EoL |type=access point |fcc_id=MK8CPX-05-WLM54G |pwr_v=9 |pwr_poe=ns |cpu1_brand=ADMtek |cpu1_model=ADM5120 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV320CBTC-70G |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4S641632K-UC75 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_minipci_num=1 |serial=10-pin header,, (115200,8,N,1) |wi1_module=Compex WLM54G |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR2413 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=2 |tp_firmware=OpenWrt, DD-WRT, |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ip=192.168.168.1 |default_pass=password |oui=00:11:7C, 00:80:48 |oui_eth=00:11:7C, 00:80:48 |default_ch= }} There is no FCC ID printed on the label. The wireless module does, hoewver, have a label with FCC ID listed.
The wireless module is soldered to the Mini PCI retaining clips. The RAM and Flash are under the Mini PCI card.
There are multiple revisions of this device. This one is probably a WP54-6E. :"C-54WPE Rev A6.1" is silkscreened on the board.
DD-WRT firmware requires activation.
{{CompexEoL}}
==Images== <gallery> File:Compex WP54G board top.jpg|board top File:Compex WP54G board bot.jpg|board bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
